name: claude-guild
description: Research & Intelligence-driven team building system for Claude Code that discovers project requirements through deep analysis and creates custom specialist teams optimized for your specific technology stack and domain needs

scripts.validate: npm run validate-guidelines && npm run validate-structure
scripts.validate-structure: node -e "const fs=require('fs-extra'); const checks=['guideline/core','guideline/templates','guideline/guide','install.js']; const valid=checks.every(p=>fs.existsSync(p)); console.log(valid?'✅ Project structure validation passed':'❌ Missing required files'); process.exit(valid?0:1);"
scripts.test: npm run validate && npm run test-install
scripts.test:all: npm run validate && npm run test-install

author: Claude Guild Team
